title: SandStorm Malzahar idea
body: WHY ISN'T THERE A SANDSTORM MALZAHAR SKIN YET... he seems perfect for the skin like... Ekko is wearing a turban face mask thing and malzahar already has that on hes basin skin... change some colors so hes more yellowy brown instead of purple... makes hes Voidlings look similar to Sand scourge Skarner.. Malzahars W could have some nice particles and look like an actual mini sandstorm... would be a great 975rp my opinion.... lets make it happen!! also why not make SandStorm Sivir, Cassiopia and Reksai!!!
